title: Most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share in total export in the y axis.
The Share in total export is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
Country Germany has the highest Share in total export and Italy has the lowest Share in total export.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share in total export in the y axis.
The Share in total export is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
Country Germany is higher than any other Countrys with value 12.9, followed by United States, and United Kingdom. Down to Country Italy with the lowest value 4.1.
The Country Italy has 1.6 times less Share in total export than average.
The Share in total export is 48.3 if we add up values of all Countrys.
